name: Blood Poker Demo
description:
THE BLOOD POKER DEMO CONSISTS OF A QUICK EXPERIENCE OF BLOOD POKER. YOU WILL FACE ONE CLIENT.

WHEN THE DEMO ENDS, THERE IS A FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING. YOU WILL KNOW WHEN IT ENDS.


The rules are simple.

The Casino stays Thirsty


  • Bet with your blood, and bleed your opponents out.
  • Play against 10 different clients, all with their own unique playstyles.
  • A Visually Heavy Artstyle and Intense Atmosphere ups the stakes of every choice.
  • Learn more about the clients, and discover more of whats going on behind the curtains.
  • Secrets to Uncover.

The Entrance Fee...


  • Simple Controls, Just a Mouse is needed.
  • Takes over an hour to beat.
  • "Streamer" and "Photosensitive" Modes to minimize tearing and reduce fast and sudden visual movements.
  • Fast In-Game References to allow anybody to play, regardless of Knowledge of Poker.
